author: jbeard
msg: Added new pages corresponding to different drawing tool demos.

author: jbeard
msg: Changed the style of scxmlToSVG.xsl scirpt to use fuschia instead of lime, and to only change the color of the stroke of composite and parallel states, rather than the fill.

author: jbeard
msg: Created drawing tool demo that is compiled in-browser, generates graphical representation on the fly, and graphically simulates it.

author: jbeard
msg: Fixed spacing in drawing-tool-precompiled (used tabs instead of two space indentation), and fixed JIT-compiled version.
